snippet: The charges against Officers Nakia Gales, 39, and Herman Jiminian, 41, include assault, falsifying records and official misconduct for their suspected role in the January 2014 attack.
abstract: Rikers Island Correction Officers Nakia Gales and Herman Jiminian face charges, including assault and falsification of records, in connection with 2014 attack on inmate Gilbert Bacallao; each face up to seven years in prison if convicted.
lead_paragraph: The charges against Officers Nakia Gales, 39, and Herman Jiminian, 41, include assault, falsifying records and official misconduct for their suspected role in the January 2014 attack.

headline.main: 2 Rikers Guards Set Up Attack on Inmate, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: 2 Jail Guards Set Up Attack on Inmate, Officials Say
